name: Sony Music Direct
info:
• 别名: Sony Music Direct (Japan) Inc.

detail:
Imprints: SMDR GT music, SoulTag
Parent company: Sony Music Distribution, Sony Music Entertainment Japan
Formerly: Sony Music House
